title: Henry Birtles
text: John Henry Birtles (1874 – 4 February 1935) was a <a href="Great%20Britain">British</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player who competed in the <a href="1900%20Summer%20Olympics">1900 Summer Olympics</a>. He was a member of the British rugby union team, which won the silver medal.
